column4: I'm reading a how-to that says I should format a partition as iso9660, anyone know how you go about doing that?
in the time (over 24 hours?) you've spent trying to do this you could have gone out and earned enough money to buy a dvd burner >.>
given the many hours so far that I've put into figuring out linux instead of just sticking to windows, I don't want to hear about it.... :)
